languages.text: "Все... красное... повсюду... красное... и он смотрит... смотрит..."
"Everything is... red... everywhere... is red... and he is watching... watching..."
languages.original_text: "Все... красное... повсюду... красное... и он смотрит... смотрит..."

traits.locale_text: "Everything is... red... everywhere... is red... and he is watching... watching..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Everything is... red... everywhere... is red... and he is watching... watching..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Everything is... red... everywhere... is red... and he is watching... watching..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Everything is... red... everywhere... is red... and he is watching... watching..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Everything is... red... everywhere... is red... and he is watching... watching..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Tout ce rouge... ce rouge... partout... et il observe... inlassablement... »
languages.original_text: "Everything is... red... everywhere... is red... and he is watching... watching..."

traits.locale_text: « Tout ce rouge... ce rouge... partout... et il observe... inlassablement... »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Alles ist ... rot ... Überall ... rot ... und er beobachtet ... beobachtet ..."
languages.original_text: "Everything is... red... everywhere... is red... and he is watching... watching..."

traits.locale_text: "Alles ist ... rot ... Überall ... rot ... und er beobachtet ... beobachtet ..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Todo es de color... rojo... por todas partes... rojo... y él está mirando... mirando...».
languages.original_text: "Everything is... red... everywhere... is red... and he is watching... watching..."

traits.locale_text: «Todo es de color... rojo... por todas partes... rojo... y él está mirando... mirando...».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “所有都是……红色……每一处都是……红色……他在看着……他在看着……”
languages.original_text: "Everything is... red... everywhere... is red... and he is watching... watching..."

traits.locale_text: “所有都是……红色……每一处都是……红色……他在看着……他在看着……”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「何もかも…赤い…そこら中…赤…そしてあの人が…見ている…」
languages.original_text: "Everything is... red... everywhere... is red... and he is watching... watching..."

traits.locale_text: 「何もかも…赤い…そこら中…赤…そしてあの人が…見ている…」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Her şey... Kırmızı... Her yer... Kırmızı... O izliyor... İzliyor..."
languages.original_text: "Everything is... red... everywhere... is red... and he is watching... watching..."
